{{Infobox Network Switch |image1 = MikroTik CRS312-4C+8XG-RM.png |image1_size = 300px |caption = CRS312 - Cloud Router Switch |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://mikrotik.com/product/crs312_4c_8xg_rm |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Supported, Not Supported, Incompatible, or leave blank for unknown --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Supported, Not Supported, Incompatible, or leave blank for unknown --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Supported, Not Supported, Incompatible, or leave blank for unknown -->
|brand = MikroTik |model = CRS312-4C+8XG |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = -RM |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 14 March 2021 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/MikroTik_CRS312-4C%2B8XG-RM |series = <!-- Device series --> |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification -->
|fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |pcb_id = <!-- Baord ID --> |ethoui = <!-- OUI -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9531; |cpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 650 <!-- doc? --> |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Nanya;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|sw1chip = Marvell;98DX8212; |sw2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|eth_ports = 12 |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_speed = 10GbE |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = <!-- IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802dot1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = supported |sup_jumbo = yes |sw_class = managed
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SFP+ |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIExpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = 4 |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 1.5 |pwr_poe_type = <!-- Type of POE --> |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = C13
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro; --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro; -->
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 08/2019 |price = 599 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Latvia
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}}
==Links of Interest== [https://i.mt.lv/cdn/product_files/CRS312-4Cplus8XG_190703.png Block Diagram]
==See also== :[[MikroTik]] • [https://mikrotik.com/products/group/switches Switches] *[[MikroTik CRS326-24G-2S+RM]] - Cloud Router Switch • [https://mikrotik.com/product/CRS326-24G-2SplusRM PPage] :24x GbE ports, 2x SFP+ cages, 1U, Dual Boot (RouterOS/SwitchOS) *[[MikroTik CRS328-24P-4S+RM]] - Cloud Router Switch • [https://mikrotik.com/product/CRS326-24G-2SplusRM PPage] :24x GbE ports, 4x SFP+ (10Gbps) ports, 1U, Dual Boot, PoE output *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD 3011 (RB3011UiAS-RM)]] • [https://mikrotik.com/product/RB3011UiAS-RM PPage] :10x Gigabit Ethernet ports, USB 3.0, LCD display *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD 4011 (RB4011iGS+RM)]] • [https://mikrotik.com/product/rb4011igs_rm PPage] : 10x GbE ports, 1x SFP+ port, PoE 802.3af/at
[[Category:English Documentation]]
